content: materials and gauge guage not important-just have a tight gauge for the yarn you have selected yarn your favorite uterus pink yarn tapestry needle for sewing poly-fill crochet hook that gives you a nice tight gauge for your yarn selection adenomyosis sucks-1 notes and hacks the stitch count is found at the end of each round inside a parenthesis if there is no stitch count then the stitch count for that round is the same as the previous round i d love to see your projects feel free to tag me #dragonbirdcreations use a scrap piece of yarn to mark the beginning of the rounds stitches and abbreviations st-stitch fo-finish off magic_ring-magic_ring tutorial on last page sl-slip single_crochet-single_crochet decrease-decrease insert hook into next stitch pull up yarn insert hook into next stitch pull up yarn yo and pull through all loops on hook adenomyosis sucks-2 uterus 1 working in the round 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 24 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 30 6 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 36 7 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet around 42 8 -16 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 17 decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 36 18 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 19 decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 30 20 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 21 decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 24 22 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 23 decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 18 begin stuffing as you go 24 -28 single_crochet in single_crochet in each single_crochet around 29 decrease in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 12 30 decrease in each single_crochet around 6 fo and sew closed adenomyosis sucks-3 tubes 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 9 3 single_crochet around until the tubes are about the same length as the uterus is high or as desired fimbriae the fun little squiggle bits chain 7 slip_stitch in next single_crochet around-join with slip_stitch to 1st slip_stitch and fo weave in your ends and sew the tubes onto the uterus © this pattern is for personal use only you have permission to sell dragonbird creations any items you make using this pattern do not distribute
